title: @riot, please fix your client, it has a major memory leak this last patch
body: after about 3 games i have to restart the client. it is fine when it connects to the game server. but before that the audio gets extremely staticy and the animations in champ select stutter. the audio is grating on my ears.

replies.body: When dealing with memory leaks, you're likely to see the program or your entire computer crash as opposed to seeing weird graphics/audio errors. This definitely sounds more like your pc having difficulty running the program over an extended amount of time. Let's try a relatively simple fix first: go into the client options and turn on low-spec mode. If that doesn't help on it's own, hit me back up and we can troubleshoot until this is solved.
